------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ kaluthara ha panadura athara pihiti waskaduwa ha pothupitiya gammana deke mayima aasannaye dumriya sthanayak sadu aarambhaka awasthawedi ema dumriya sthanayata namak dima sadaha wishala gataluwakata muhuna dimata ekala siti dumriya baladharinta siduwiya.gammana deke janaya athara thamange game nama dumriya sthanayata damiya yuthuyayi matha gatumak wiya.waskadawa gamwasin dumriya sthanaya "waskaduwa dumriya sthanaya " yayi nam kala yuthu bawa pawasu athara pothupitiya gamwasin pawasuwe thamange game nama eeta damiya yuthu bawayi.suluwen patan gath mema gataluwa pasuwa mini mara ganna tharamata ugra wiya.awasanaye gam dekema nama nodama "nommara 1 dumriya sthanaya" lesa dumriya sthanaya nam kirimata baladhari thiranaya wiya.

polis niladharin lesa peni sitimin maha manga gaman karana pudgalayan pariksha karana muwawen owun sathu mudal jangama durakathana ha depala mankolla ka kalliyaka samajikayan dedenaku athadanguwata ganimata galkissa polisiye aparadha anshaya samath wi atha.athadanguwata ganna lada sakakaruwan dedena galkissa pradeshaye angalum kamhalaka sewaya nimakara siya nawathana wetha gaman karamin siti pudgalayan dedenaku pariksha karana muwawen owun sathuwa thibu mudal rupiyal 10,000 k ha jangama durakathana 2 k ragena palagos athi bawata lada paminillakata anuwa mema sakakaruwan dedena athadanguwata gena owun santhakaye thibu depala da polis bharayata gena thibe.mema sakakaruwan dehiwala pradeshaye padinchi wayasa 22 ha 36 athara pasuwannan bawa polisiya kiyayi.galkissa kottasa bhara polis adhikari rawindra karawita mahathage adhikshanaya yatathe galkissa mulasthana pradhana polis parikshaka ke.
